00003 /*
00004  * Constructor - pass in the length scale, variance and offset
00005  */
00006 NeuralNetCF::NeuralNetCF(double ls, double var, double offst)
00007 : CovarianceFunction("Neural network covariance function", 3), sigma2(parameters[0]),
00008 variance(parameters[1]), offset(parameters[2])
00009 {
00010     // Make sure parameters are positive 
00011     assert( ls > 0.0 && var > 0.0 && offset > 0.0);  
00012     
00013     sigma2 = ls;   // Length scale
00014     variance = var;
00015     offset = offst;
00016     
00017     // Parameter names
00018     parametersNames[0] = "sigma2";
00019     parametersNames[1] = "variance";
00020     parametersNames[2] = "offset";
00021 }

00034 inline double NeuralNetCF::computeElement(const vec& A, const vec& B) const
00035 {
00036     // vec Ahat = A*sqrt(sigma2);
00037     // vec Bhat = B*sqrt(sigma2);
00038     
00039     // return variance * asin( 2*(offset+dot(Ahat,Bhat)) /
00040     //                        sqrt( (1.0+offset+dot(Ahat,Ahat)) * (1.0+offset+dot(Bhat,Bhat)) )
00041     //                      );}
00042     
00043     double u = offset+dot(A,B)*sigma2;
00044     double vA = 1.0+offset+dot(A,A)*sigma2;
00045     double vB = 1.0+offset+dot(B,B)*sigma2;
00046     double v = sqrt(vA*vB);
00047     
00048     return variance * asin( u / v) * 2/M_PI;
00049 }
00050 
00054 void NeuralNetCF::covarianceGradient(mat& grad, const int parameterNumber, const mat& X) const
00055 {
00056     assert(parameterNumber < getNumberParameters());
00057     assert(parameterNumber >= 0);
00058 
00059     Transform* t = getTransform(parameterNumber);
00060     double gradientModifier = t->gradientTransform(getParameter(parameterNumber));
00061 
00062     switch(parameterNumber)
00063     {
00064         // Derivative with respect to sigma2
00065                 case 0 :
00066         {
00067             vec Xi, Xj;
00068             
00069             for (int i=0; i<X.rows(); i++)
00070             {
00071                 Xi = X.get_row(i);
00072                 
00073                 double vA = 1 + offset + dot(Xi, Xi) * sigma2;
00074                 double dvA = dot(Xi, Xi);
00075                 
00076                 for (int j=0; j<=i; j++) 
00077                 {
00078                     Xj = X.get_row(j);
00079                     
00080                     double u = offset+dot(Xi,Xj)*sigma2;
00081                     double vB = 1 + offset + dot(Xj, Xj) * sigma2;
00082                     double v = sqrt(vA*vB);
00083                     
00084                     double du = dot(Xi,Xj);
00085                     double dvB = dot(Xj, Xj);
00086                     double dv = 0.5 * (dvA*vB + vA*dvB) / v;
00087                     
00088                     grad(i,j) = (du*v - u*dv) / (v*sqrt(v*v - u*u));
00089                     grad(j,i) = grad(i,j);
00090                 }
00091             }
00092             grad *= variance * 2/M_PI;
00093 
00094             break;
00095         }
00096 
00097         // Derivative with respect to variance
00098         case 1 :
00099         {
00100             covariance(grad, X);
00101             grad /= variance;
00102             break;
00103         }
00104 
00105         // Derivative with respect to offset
00106         case 2:
00107                 vec Xi, Xj;
00108 
00109                 for (int i=0; i<X.rows(); i++)
00110                 {
00111                         Xi = X.get_row(i);
00112 
00113                         double vA = 1 + offset + dot(Xi, Xi) * sigma2;
00114 
00115                         for (int j=0; j<=i; j++) 
00116                         {
00117                                 Xj = X.get_row(j);
00118 
00119                                 double u = offset+dot(Xi,Xj)*sigma2;
00120                                 double vB = 1 + offset + dot(Xj, Xj) * sigma2;
00121                                 double v = sqrt(vA*vB);
00122 
00123                                 double dv = 0.5 * (vB + vA) / v;
00124 
00125                                 grad(i,j) = (v - u*dv) / (v*sqrt(v*v - u*u));
00126                                 grad(j,i) = grad(i,j);
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 grad *= variance * 2/M_PI;
00130 
00131                 break;
00132     }
00133     
00134     
00135     grad *= gradientModifier;
00136 
00137 }
